keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer tests within one week.
Labour will freeze energy bills until 2017 and give the energy regulator the power to cut bills this winter.
Labour will not raise VAT, National Insurance or income tax for those earning under £60,000, while cutting taxes for 24 million working people and giving an £800 million boost for first-time buyers.
Labour will lower tuition fees to £6,000 a year and guarantee a job for young people out of work for a year, paid for with a tax on bankers.
Labour will extend free childcare from 15 to 25 hours for working parents of three and four-year-olds.

issues.health: Labour will recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours and cancer tests within one week.

housing.content: Labour will give an £800 million boost for first-time buyers.
